scripts.test:user-guid: tsc utils/userGuid.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --outDir dist-test && node tests/user-guid.test.js
scripts.test:ai-connection: tsc lib/aiClient.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir tests && node tests/ai-connection.test.js
scripts.test:design-concepts: tsc lib/designConcept.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir tests && node tests/design-concept.test.js
scripts.test:design-evaluation: tsc lib/designEvaluation.ts --target ES2017 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop --outDir tests && node tests/design-evaluation.test.js
